name: Ophelia
description: The mortician holding a mysterious suitcase has a strange curiosity for the Radiants.

passiveSkill.name: My Beloved
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "Every time an enemy partner dies while Ophelia is present, 1 Beloved is summoned. Beloved increases DMG RES Rate by {placeholder} and ignores DMG from normal attacks and Special Skills. There may be at most {placeholder} Beloved(s) at one time. An allied partner may be deployed atop a Beloved to immediately destroy it."}
